title: Is the beast in Revelation 13:11-18, which comes out of the Earth, the United States of America? - Quora
tags: Politics of the United States of America

response.answer_text: Is the beast in Revelation 13:11-18, which comes out of the Earth, the United States of America? Its the United State, but its Revelation, chapter 13, versus 11–17. is of the second beast, verse 18, of Chapter 13, goes with versus 1–10, the description of the first beast, Date:1981. Revelation 13, verse 11, is the date of the inauguration of the 41st president and is father to 43 Revelation 15:2. Date: September 11, 2001

No this is the false religious system. The US is mentioned in prophecy, to understand it you must understand the lost tribes of Israel, where they are and then prophecy pertaining to them will be clear in these last days. US is generally referred to as Manasseh and the strongest fortress. Here is an article that goes over Anglo - America in prophecy Who are the 12 Tribes of Israel?
